main event: An optometrist from Dickson, Tennessee reported seeing a huge flying saucer, made of aluminum and powered by motors, on October 26, 1949.
interesting points: The saucer was flying very high and at a very high rate of speed,The object was invisible unless the sun struck it at the proper angle,There were four other adults who witnessed the sighting,The optometrist requested no publicity about the matter,The sighting was described in a letter forwarded to U.S. Army Intelligence.
witness description: an optometrist and four other adults
